scene_description_enriched: A monk, clad in a brown habit with a hood, is seated on a wooden stool, placing his hand on the head of a young person who is kneeling with hands clasped in prayer. The young person wears a pink tunic and a blue scarf. The scene is set against a light background, with decorative foliage and small, dark, spiky elements suggesting a stylized natural environment. The overall impression is one of spiritual guidance and devotion.
